name: UNI (itch)
description:
In UNI you will have for goal to unite as much dudes as you can, because there should be ONLY ONE GROUP.

The only button you need to play the left mouse button

First, you are presented groups, each group has it's opinion, but you can't know which until you try and find out by trying to recuit them.

When you start a discussion, you have the choice between the four ways to talk them into being recruited by you, by holding the buttons you charge your discussion, if successful the persuasion will work better, but it is harder to complete.

On releasing you are launched into a minigame, you have 30s to complete it, here are the descriptions :

Logic (Blue) :

You must prove you're logic in your arguments, it should feel lik solving a puzzle, and that's you gotta do : rotate by left clicking the tiles to connect as much dots as possible.

Feelings (Red) :

You should make them feel, and what's easier to feel than fear and terror ? That's right, nothing ! Gain points by murdering as many people the fastest possible, left click to mass murder.

Rumor (Green) :

Hearsays spreads, but if not enough people spreads it they will stop. Click on the balls to convince them (they're more light), if they collide with an unconvinced ball (the dark ones) they get unconvinced too, but they won't change if they meet another convinced ball. Convince them all and spread the rumor !

Cats (Orange) :

You were going to speak with them but suddenly... Cats. They are so cute. But what's even cuter ? Flying cats ! Click them to launch them in the sky, flying cats brings points with time, but cats hugging too is good ! When they collide you have a boost ! Make everyone say "Owwwww", they won't be able to resist you.

If when ending the minigame your score (the percentage) is less than the bar, you lose, otherwise, you start persuading them (the bar at the top fills up), the more the bottom bar was high, the more you talk them into joining you.

When it's full you win the dudes and you choose another group to recruit !

This game was made in 48h by me, for the Game Maker's Tool Kit 2019 Game Jam !
